accessibility_overhead_kick.comment: Overhead kick of bicycle kick. Description is here https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bicycle_kick.  is an acrobatic strike where a player kicks an airborne ball rearward in midair. It is achieved by throwing the body backward up into the air and, before descending to the ground, making a shearing movement with the lower limbs to get the ball-striking leg in front of the other. In most languages, the manoeuvre is named after either the cycling motion or the scissor motion that it resembles.

accessibility_stats_comparison_explanati.value:
Jedwali la Tabia za Mchezaji linaonyesha nguvu na udhaifu wa ki takwimu wa mchezaji, ikilinganishwa na wachezaji wenzake ambao ni sawa.

Kila kipimo kinabadilishwa kwa msingi wa dakika 90 na kinajumuisha mechi kutoka siku 365 zilizopita.

Kisha wachezaji wanalinganishwa na wenzao katika nafasi sawa kutoka ligi zinazofanana, na kuwekwa katika daraja la asilimia. Kwa mfano, mchezaji mwenye daraja la asilimia 90 katika Unafungua Fursa ina maana kwamba wanatengeneza fursa zaidi ya 90% ya wachezaji katika nafasi yao katika ligi zinazofanana.

Maelezo kamili kuhusu ulinganisho unaweza kupatikana katika Maswali Yanayoulizwa Mara kwa Mara.

accessibility_stats_comparison_fullbacks.comment: A description highlighting that a player's stat is benchmarked against other fullbacks. Fullback is a term for players taking on any variation of left or right back roles.

common_deepstats_explanation.value:
Data yote imehasibiwa kutokana na takwimu zinazotolewa na Opta.

Kiwango cha mchezaji cha FotMob kinahesabiwa kulingana na zaidi ya takwimu 100 za kila mchezaji kwa mchezo.

Mchezo katika viwango vya kila mchezo ni mchezo wowote mchezaji amekuwa katika hata kama alichukua nafasi kama bwamba katika dakika hizo za mwisho.

Mchezaji lazima amcheze angalau 50% ya michezo yote na angalau dakika 90 (kwa takwimu za kwa 90) ili ajumuishwe katika orodha.

common_deepstats_explanation_ios.comment: We need double percentage sign here due to internal issue
common_deepstats_explanation_ios.value:
Data zote zimehesabiwa kulingana na takwimu zilizo katika Opta.

ukadiriaji wa mchezaji wa FotMob unahesabiwa kwa kutumia zaidi ya 100 za kila mchezaji kwa kila mechi.

Mechi katika kadiri za kila mechi ni mechi yoyote ambayo mshiriki ameshiriki bila kujali kama alibadilishwa nyuma dakika chache.

Mchezaji lazima amcheze angalau 50%% ya mechi zote na angalau dakika 90 (kwa takwimu kila 90) ili kujumuishwa katika orodha.

seo_xg_table_explanation.comment: Text for explaining what the xG table is. The text has newline seperators in it.
seo_xg_table_explanation.value:
Jedwali la xG linaorodhesha timu kulingana na takwimu zao za magoli yanayotarajiwa (xG).

â¢ Nambari za kijani zina maana timu inaendelea vizuri zaidi kuliko ilivyotarajiwa.
â¢ Nambari za nyekundu zina maana timu inaendelea vibaya kuliko ilivyotarajiwa.
â¢ Nambari ndogo karibu na thamani ya xG inaonyesha tofauti kati ya utendaji uliotarajiwa na ule uliopo.

Kwa maelezo zaidi kuhusu jinsi inavyohesabiwa, angalia FAQ.

seo_xg_table_header.comment: A label for choosing the xG table (also called Justice table) that shows the table based on expected points.

seo_xga_short.comment: Short for expected goals against. Used in table column header so should not be longer than 4 characters.

seo_xpts_explanation.comment: Explanation of the xG table. The text has newline separators in it.
seo_xpts_explanation.value:
Pointi Inazotarajiwa (xPts) zinaonyesha idadi ya pointi timu inatarajiwa kupata kutoka kwenye mechi, kulingana na ubora wa fursa zao uliopimwa na Goli Inazotarajiwa (xG).

xPts kwa mechi hupimwa kwa kuiga matokeo yanayowezekana kwa kutumia ubora wa mapigo, unaoonyeshwa kama xG. Uigaji huu unatengeneza pointi kwa ushindi, miangazani, au upotevu kulingana na xG.

xPts huongezwa katika msimu kuunda 'Jedwali la xG', pia linajulikana kama 'Jedwali la Haki', ambalo linatoa mtazamo mbadala wa utendaji wa timu zaidi ya pointi halisi zilizopatikana.

seo_xpts_explanation_green_numbers.comment: Explanation of the green numbers in the xG table. Underlying numbers refer to xG.
seo_xpts_explanation_green_numbers.value: Nambari za kijani zinaonyesha nambari bora zaidi za msingi kuliko matokeo halisi ya timu.

seo_xpts_explanation_link.comment: Link to the explanation of the xG table.

seo_xpts_explanation_red_numbers.comment: Explanation of the red numbers in the xG table. Underlying numbers refer to xG.
seo_xpts_explanation_red_numbers.value: Nambari nyekundu zinaonyesha takwimu zilizopo chini zaidi kuliko matokeo halisi ya timu.

seo_xpts_short.comment: Short for expected points. Used in table column header so should not be longer than 4 characters.

seo_you_joined_the_league.comment: Short text in a toast dialogue explaining they succesfully joined a league through an invite link.

seo_your_subscription_has_expired.comment: Used for bottom sheet title when subscription has expired

seo_zero_points.comment: Title for "0 points medal". User gets "0 points" when they predict wrong.
